text:
e="preserve">Colette Giudicelli (24 November 1943 – 24 September 2020) was a French politician. She was a member of the Senate of France from 2008 until her death. She represented the Alpes-Maritimes department. Giudicelli was a member of the Union for a Popular Movement party and later of the The Republicans.
She began her political career as city councillor of Menton in 1989. Giudicelli was married to Jean-Claude Guibal, mayor of Menton.
Giudicelli died on 24 September 2020, at the age of 76.
